This website was maintained by Esther Plomp, the Data Steward of the Faculty of Applied Sciences from December 2018 to December 2024.

More information: intranet page on [Data Stewardship at Applied Sciences](https://intranet.tudelft.nl/-/data-stewardship-at-applied-sciences)

*Esther Plomp. (2024). TNW-OS-Support website (v1.0.0). Zenodo. <https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.14176608>*
